lead_paragraph: A declaration regarding the killing of Mustafa Amine Badreddine raised more questions than it answered, including what the death says about Hezbollah.

headline.print_headline: Hezbollah Says Military Leader Died in an Artillery Attack
headline.main: Hezbollah Says Military Leader Died in Artillery Attack

snippet: A declaration regarding the killing of Mustafa Amine Badreddine raised more questions than it answered, including what the death says about Hezbollah.
abstract: Lebanese rebel group Hezbollah reports death of senior commander Mustafa Amine Badreddine in Syria, killed in artillery attack by rival groups opposing Pres Bashar al-Assad; many questions remain about Badreddine's death and what killing reveals about state of Hezbollah's war efforts in Syria.
